scripts.build: npm test && docker build -t aumbadgah-app-tmpl -f dev.Dockerfile .
scripts.rm-container: if docker inspect --type container aumbadgah-app-tmpl; then docker rm -f aumbadgah-app-tmpl; else echo 'No existing container'; fi
scripts.prestart: npm run rm-container && npm run build
scripts.run-container: docker run --name aumbadgah-app-tmpl -i --expose ${PORT:=3000} -p ${PORT:=3000}:${PORT:=3000} --env PORT=${PORT:=3000} --env NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:=dev} --env BASE_PATH=${BASE_PATH:=/} --volume $(pwd)/lib/front/src/templates:/app/lib/front/src/templates --volume $(pwd)/lib/front/dist:/app/lib/front/dist aumbadgah-app-tmpl
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/front/src && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/modules && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/routes && node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/server.js && node_modules/.bin/eslint test && node_modules/.bin/mocha test
